Package com.example.homescreen.Screens

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddFriendScreen
    An activity where a user can enter a specific username to add a "target user" to their friends list.
    FriendsScreen
    The FriendsScreen allows a user to browse the list of users on their friends list.
    HomeScreen
    The main activity in Perfect Ten.
    LoginScreen
    Screen showed on start up of the app when logged out Allows users to login to their profile with username and password
    PostCreation
    PostCreation allows a user to create a post object post object is sent to the server server adds the object to an Array of posts updated array is sent back to the client
    ProfileView
    The ProfileView allows the client to view a user's profile.
    SettingsScreen
    Activity where a user can edit app settings Has not been implemented yet
    SignUp
    SignUp allows users to create a new user The user is added to the database of users Submit button sends request to server toLogin button sets activity to homeScreen Errors are handled based on whether a user can be made with the specified inputs Specified inputs include: name, password, and email Errors will be thrown if: -A field is left blank -The username is taken -The password is invalid -The email is invalid
    universalBar
    UniversalBar holds buttons to send a user to HomeScreen, Settings, and FriendsScreen The bar is placed at the bottom of screens within the app Provides access to the three screens from any page with UniversalBar
